with select_month as( select to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1*(level-1)),'yyyy-mm') mon from dual connect by level <= 6 ) select mon, sum(nvl(interior_price,0)) as total_price,interior_designer, m.member_name, m.MEMBER_PHONE from select_month left join (select * from interior_tbl) on (mon = substr(interior_payment_date,1,7)) left join member_tbl m on interior_designer = member_id where mon = #{toMonth} and rownum < 6 group by (mon,interior_designer,m.member_name,m.member_phone) order by 2 desc

select nvl(sum(i.interior_price),0) as total_of_month, nvl(sum(i.interior_price * (1 - i.interior_payment_charge/100)),0) as designer_month, nvl(sum(i.interior_price * (i.interior_payment_charge/100)),0) as site_revenue from interior_tbl i where substr(i.INTERIOR_PAYMENT_DATE,1,7) = #{monthDate}

mapper.insert: insert into INTERIOR_DETAIL_TBL (INTERIOR_NO, SPACE_NAME, SPACE_COUNT, SPACE_PRICE) select i.INTERIOR_NO, u.SPACE_NAME, u.SPACE_COUNT, case u.SPACE_NAME when '거실' then p.PRICE_LIVING when '주방' then p.PRICE_KITCHEN when '침실' then p.PRICE_BED when '원룸' then p.PRICE_ONEROOM when '아이방' then p.PRICE_KIDROOM when '서재' then p.PRICE_STUDY end as SPACE_PRICE from INTERIOR_TBL i join PRICE_TBL p on 1=1 join ( select INTERIOR_NO, SPACE_NAME, SPACE_COUNT from INTERIOR_TBL unpivot ( SPACE_COUNT for SPACE_NAME in ( INTERIOR_LIVING as '거실', INTERIOR_KITCHEN as '주방', INTERIOR_BED as '침실', INTERIOR_ONEROOM as '원룸', INTERIOR_KIDROOM as '아이방', INTERIOR_STUDY as '서재' ) ) ) u on i.INTERIOR_NO = u.INTERIOR_NO where substr(i.INTERIOR_PAYMENT_DATE,1,7) = #{monthDate} and u.SPACE_COUNT > 0
